actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide higher rates of basic pay for Federal employees within the consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of which the District of Columbia and the city of Baltimore, Maryland, is a part.

summary.text: Provides for higher rates of basic pay (108 percent of otherwise applicable rates) for Federal employees within the consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of which the District of Columbia and Baltimore, Maryland, are a part.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide higher rates of basic pay for Federal employees within the consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of which the District of Columbia and the city of Baltimore, Maryland, is a part.
